articles.title: Great Salt Lake is shrinking fast. Scientists demand action before it becomes a toxic dustbin - CNN
articles.description: Great Salt Lake is also known as America's Dead Sea -- owing to a likeness to its much smaller Middle Eastern counterpart -- but scientists worry the moniker could soon take new meaning.
